description:
Work micro-nubbins and polished edges with these super sensitive and flexible pseudo-slippers. They have a sticky rubber toe patch to aid hooking and scrumming and an S-heel construction to add power to your heel hooks. The split sole is designed to spread under load to reduce deformation and help you balance on tiny edges.

  • SkinLike™ Microbase uppers are made from microfibre for a glove-like fit and sensitive feel
  • Hook-and-loop closure for easy on/off and to tune in a performance fit
  • S-Heel™ offers stable, confident heel hooking
  • Slip-lasted construction with 0.8mm LapsoFlex midsoles
  • Sticky rubber toe patch
  • Single-strap slipper for technical routes and boulder problems
  • Vibram® P3® rand is designed for durability and to minimize stretch
  • Soles are 4mm Vibram® XS Grip2
  • La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size
name: La Sportiva Skwama Vegan Rock Shoes - Women's
